document_data.mainbody:
Essard was a guest at the Open Feast of  held at Castle Obarskyr in Suzail, Cormyr.
Per another guest, Essard had servants, some of which may have kin who worked at the palace.
At the Open Feast held at Castle Obarskyr in Mirtul 26 of the , Essard asked why there still was a haunted wing at the Royal Palace of Suzail, and why it hadnt been un-haunted with spells or faith. It was explained to them that it had been tried, but it just wouldnt take.
